beforeDelayDiscountingTrial.text: In the first task, you must choose between two different monetary values, which you would receive as your rewards. Although the amounts of money are hypothetical, we ask you to act as if they were real amounts of money.
There is no right or wrong decision here, so take the time to make your choice. To give you a first impression, here are a few examples before the real task starts.
To make your choice, simply use arrow keys to select the appropriate amount. To start, click on "Start" button.
